contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Airline | airline = Zantop Air Transport | image = | image_size = | IATA = | ICAO = | callsign = | founded = {{avyear|1962}} | commenced = | ceased = 1966 | hubs = | secondary_hubs = | focus_cities = [[Detroit, Michigan]] | frequent_flyer = | lounge = | alliance = | subsidiaries = | fleet_size = | destinations = | parent = | company_slogan = | headquarters = | key_people = Lloyd Zantop | website = }} '''Zantop Air Transport''' was a [[United States]] airline formed from [[Zantop Flying Service]] in 1962. The [[Civil Aeronautics Board]] approved transfer of the operating certificate of [[Coastal Airlines]] to Zantop Air Transport, which had incorporated and become a supplemental air carrier. The former company had been a hauler for the [[Big Three automobile manufacturers|Big Three]] automakers. With the new arrangement Zantop could provide individually waybilled services. The original founders of Zantop Flying Services, the Zantop brothers, all sold their stock and resigned from the company in 1966, at which time it became [[Universal Airlines (US)|Universal Airlines]], Inc. The airline was based at Wayne County Airport, Inster, Michigan.<ref name=ZAT>{{cite book |last=|first=|title=American Aviation|date=June 23, 1969|publisher=Ziff-Davis Pub. Co.|location=|pages=}}</ref> [[Zantop International Airlines]] was incorporated in May, 1972 with 100% of the stock being owned by the Zantop family. == Fleet == The Zantop Air Transport fleet consists of the following aircraft as of :1966 <center> {| class="toccolours sortable" border="1" cellpadding="3" style="border-collapse:collapse" |+ '''Zantop Air Transport Fleet''' |- bgcolor=#6495ED !Aircraft !Total !Routes !Notes ! |- |ARMSTRONG WHITWORTH ARGOSY |7 | | |- |CURTISS WRIGHT C-46 COMMANDO |51 | | |- |DC-3/C-47 |11 | | |- |DC-4 / C-54 |6 | | |- |DC-6 |5 | | |- |DC-7BF |17 |Detroit-Willow Run | |} </center> == Incidents and accidents == *28 July 1966 Curtiss C-46A-45-CU N9905F *16 June 1966 Curtiss C-46A-60-CK N10415 2 Fatlities *14 October 1965 Armstrong Whitworth AW-650 Arg N601Z *13 September 1965 Curtiss C-46D-5-CU N5132B *30 December 1964 Curtiss C-46A-45-CU N608Z 4 Fatalities *20 November 1964 Curtiss C-46F-1-CU N3971B *30 June 1964 Douglas C-54A-5-DC N188S *7 December 1963 Curtiss C-46A-20-CU N609Z 3 Fatalities *16 Feb 1963 Curtiss C-46F-1-CU N616Z *[[1961 Cincinnati Zantop DC-4 crash|14 November 1961 Douglas DC-4 N30061]]<ref>{{cite web|title=Zantop Air Transport- Accident & incidents|url=http://aviation-safety.net/database/operator/airline.php?var=4550|accessdate=15 Mar 2011}}</ref> == References == <references /> [[Category:Defunct airlines of the United States]] [[Category:Airlines established in 1962]] [[Category:Airlines disestablished in 1966]] [[Category:Zantop Air Transport| ]]
